thread.title: Meek Mill's Back On Instagram With An Announcement
thread.title_full: Meek Mill's Back On Instagram With An Announcement

author: Victoria Hernandez
title: Meek Mill's Back On Instagram With An Announcement
text:
12 
Meek Mill has returned to his official Instagram account after shutting it down a few weeks ago. Among his new posts are a clip of him attending last night’s Super Bowl and a picture of him with New England Patriots owner Robert Kraft. A video posted by Meek Mill (@meekmill) on Feb 6, 2017 at 3:44pm PST A photo posted by Meek Mill (@meekmill) on Feb 6, 2017 at 4:41pm PST 
One of the more eye-catching posts is an orange cover art with a picture of a toddler Meek Mill and the caption “Down Forever.” It is unclear what exactly the cover is for, but the Philly rapper has teased DC4.5 . The cover art for DC4 was also orange and featured a teenaged Meek. The new art could also be a single perhaps with the title of the caption. A photo posted by Meek Mill (@meekmill) on Feb 6, 2017 at 4:19pm PST 
This account was noticeably offline when a newly-single Nicki Minaj posted a picture of herself and Drake that sent the internet ablaze. What seemed to be a parody account for Meek Mill reposted the picture tagging Drake a “nut-ass nigga” while the rest of the world wide web gave Meek another L for his ex reuniting with his rival.
